name: Brewster Hughes
description: '''Brewster Hughes''' (12 December 1912 â€“ 30 September 1986), born '''Ignatius Abiodun Oke''' and who later used the name '''Ernest Henley Oke Hughes''', was a Nigerian guitarist, bandleader and community leader who was active in Britain as a [[highlife]] performer and recording artist after the [[Second World War]].
